commit_scope: Stabilize CI gates by reducing governance vote-function complexity and hardening commit-traceability spec listing against GitHub API rate limits
evidence_refs: cd api && pytest -q tests/test_governance_api.py tests/test_spec_registry_api.py tests/test_ideas.py tests/test_inventory_api.py

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Governed contributor flow remains functional while CI gates no longer fail on maintainability regression from cast_vote complexity and commit traceability gracefully handles GitHub 403 rate-limit for specs listing.
test_flows: api: post change request and vote yes/no; verify applied/rejected states
api: call commit-traceability gate and verify structured response shape under degraded upstream conditions
web: contributor console remains usable for submit-and-vote path

commands: cd api && pytest -q tests/test_governance_api.py tests/test_spec_registry_api.py tests/test_ideas.py tests/test_inventory_api.py

phase_gate.reason: Awaiting CI and public deployment validation
